column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tonraq says : " Thank you for coming , everyone .
#Text=Troubling is when I get that itchy rash that wo n't go away , and Zhu Li 's not around to scratch it .
#Text=This is shocking .
#Text=Nay , sickening !
#Text=But these kale cookies ?
#Text=Opposite .
#Text=Remind me to get the recipe later .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " What 's your point , Varrick ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " My point is , Unalaq 's already booted our chieftains out of their palace .
#Text=How long before he starts telling us what kind of cookies we can eat ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Probably a couple of days .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Rhetorical question , Zhu Li , you got ta keep up .
#Text=Not to mention , I 've got a cargo ship full of halibut that 's rotting thanks to this harbor lockdown ?
#Text=Who wants to buy a ship full of stinking fish ?
#Text=Seriously , it 's not rhetorical .
#Text=I need to sell these fish .
#Text=" Korra says : " Chief Unalaq is here to help the South .
#Text=He wants to show us how to restore balance with the spirits so they 'll stop attacking .
#Text=" Varrick says : " The only spirit I 'm interested in restoring is our spirit of independence .
#Text=Am I right , people ?
#Text=" Korra says : " All Unalaq is trying to do is make our tribes unified again .
#Text=" Varrick says : " No , he wants control of our wealth .
#Text=My wealth .
#Text=And I like my wealth .
#Text=If Unalaq does n't pull his forces out , then we have no choice but to fight for our freedom !
#Text=" Korra says : " You want to start a war ?
#Text=Are you crazy ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Unalaq started this , not us .
#Text=I 'm sorry , maybe you could speak with your uncle .
#Text=Tell him how frustrated we all are .
#Text=He 'll listen to what the Avatar has to say .
#Text=Do it for me ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll do it for the tribe .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I can not stop eating these things .
#Text=Look , we all know where this conflict is heading .
#Text=We need to start preparing for war .
#Text="
